languages.text: "Ты говоришь об этом несмотря на то, что твоей семье может грозить смерть в случае предательства?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты говоришь об этом, несмотря на то, что твоей семье может грозить смерть в случае предательства?"

languages.text: "You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь об этом несмотря на то, что твоей семье может грозить смерть в случае предательства?"

traits.locale_text: "You speak of it even when your family may potentially face death if found guilty of treason?"
"You speak of it even when your family may potentially face death if found guilty of treason?"
"Are you speaking of it even as your family may potentially face death if found guilty of treason?"
"Are you speaking of it even as your family may potentially face death if found guilty of treason?"
"You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"
"You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"

languages.text: 「お前の家族が反逆罪で死を迎える可能性があったとしても、話すのか？」
languages.original_text: "You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の家族が反逆罪で死を迎える可能性があったとしても、話すのか？」

languages.text: “你的族人很可能会因为你的证词而背上叛国罪，被处以极刑。你明知道这样的下场，也执意要告诉我这件事情吗？”
languages.original_text: "You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"

traits.locale_text: “你的族人很可能会因为你的证词而背上叛国罪，处以极刑。你明知道这样的下场，也执意要告诉我这件事情吗？”

languages.text: « Vous m'en parlez alors que votre famille risque d'être accusée de trahison et exécutée ? »
languages.original_text: "You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'en parlez alors que votre famille risque d'être accusée de trahison et exécutée ? »

languages.text: «¿Habla de ello incluso cuando su familia podría enfrentarse a la muerte si es declarada culpable de traición?».
languages.original_text: "You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Habla de ello incluso cuando su familia podría enfrentarse a la muerte si es declarada culpable de traición?».

languages.text: "Ihr sagt das, obwohl Eurer Familie die Todesstrafe droht, wenn sie des Hochverrats für schuldig befunden wird?"
languages.original_text: "You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sagt das, obwohl Eurer Familie die Todesstrafe droht, wenn sie des Hochverrats für schuldig befunden wird?"

languages.text: "Hanen ihanetten suçlu bulunup ölümle karşı karşıya kalabilecek olsa dahi bunu söylemeyi göze mi aldın?"
languages.original_text: "You tell me this even though your family may face death if found guilty of treason?"

traits.locale_text: "Hanen ihanetten suçlu bulunup ölümle karşı karşıya kalsa dahi bunu söylemeyi göze mi aldın?"
